main.name: Alex Birtwistle
main.description: I'm a student at the University of Windsor seeking to kickstart my career
main.bio: I worked with Java in school and fell in love with JavaScript and its related frameworks and tools. I've used a lot of Oracle PL/SQL and PHPMyAdmin. My goal has been to learn the MERN stack and REST API development to be a flexible developer.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me, you can use this to email me directly!

education.description: I've taken a majority of the important courses for working in software development. The courses I've taken are listed in my written resume.

work.title: Crew Member
work.description: Expert in teamwork and communication, delivering products quick and on time.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: The language I prefer to develop everything in. It has access to near limitless powerful libraries.

skills.name: ReactJS
skills.description: A front-end design powerhouse that I use to greatly assist my front end development. This website is made using it.

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: An extremely powerful runtime environment that allows me to use javascript libraries and packages.

skills.name: Socket.io
skills.description: This is a library used by NodeJS that allows you to set up a socket to communicate between multiple clients.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: My first object oriented programming language, and the one that I spent the most time developing with.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I have only recently started using git specifically so I could keep my projects safe online and update them through linux commands.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I used this service to host this website for free and I will host my future projects using this.

skills.name: C#
skills.description: I've used C# multiple times in different classes. I mostly used it for game development in Unity and rarely used it for group projects.

skills.name: Asp.net
skills.description: I've experimented with asp.net multiple times and I'm familiar with it and its MVC model.

projects.title: PHP Group Project
projects.category: A PHP based planner done formally using documentation and agile software engineering.

projects.title: Bootleg Discord
projects.category: My first major project, a fully integrated login & chat system using Socket.io & Router.js. SQL is used for the login information.
